tool.name: gumloop_retrieve_input_schema
tool.description: Retrieve the input schema for flows in Gumloop. If youâ€™re starting a flow and are unsure about its input schema, use this tool to obtain the required schema first.

saved_item_id.description: The ID of the saved item for which to retrieve input schemas.
saved_item_id.title: Saved Item Id

user_id.description: User ID that created the flow. Required if project_id is not provided.
user_id.title: User Id

project_id.description: Project ID that the flow is under. Required if user_id is not provided.
project_id.title: Project Id
